UPON INSPECTION, CREW FOUND THAT THE THIRD THROUGH THIRTIETH CARS WERE DERAILED.  IT APPEARS THAT THE THIRD CAR FELL INSIDE THE GAUGE, CAUSING THE OUTSIDE RAIL TO ROLL OVER.  THERE WERE NO HAZARDOUS MATERIAL CARS IN THE CONSIST.  THERE WERE NO INJURIES TO ANYONE INVOLVED IN THEINCIDENT.
